News.Title: Sahana Systems Reports Strong H1 Growth with Revenue Doubling to 1.14B Rupees
News.Summary: Sahana Systems delivered robust H1 performance with consolidated net profit surging 95% to 277M rupees and revenue more than doubling to 1.14B rupees from 526M rupees year-over-year. Despite strong growth, EBITDA margin compressed to 33.16% from 37.50% in the previous year, though absolute EBITDA increased significantly to 379M rupees from 197M rupees.

News.Title: Sahana System's Subsidiary Softvan Secures ₹7.74 Crore Indian Navy Contract
News.Summary: Sahana System's subsidiary Softvan has received a ₹7.74 crore contract from the Indian Navy for RF measurement system upgradation. The delivery is scheduled to be completed by April 5, 2026.

News.Title: Sahana Systems Empanelled with Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited
News.Summary: Sahana Systems has achieved empanelment with Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited (HPCL). This empanelment suggests that Sahana Systems has been approved to provide services or products to HPCL, potentially opening up new business opportunities for the company.
